ai-patthana20.3:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana20.3:1.1_1: Nor gives rise to undefiled freedom.
ai-patthana20.3:2.1_1: Defilements doesn’t give rise to defilements.
ai-patthana20.3:3.1_0: Defiled, Defilements accompanied by defilements, for the sake of defiled ...
ai-patthana20.3:5.1_0: Not Defilements for the sake of defilements.
ai-patthana20.3:5.1_1: No undefiled freedom by heart and freedom by wisdom.
ai-patthana20.3:5.1_2: Dispelling the Teaching that arise from defilements that arise because of defilements and for the three reasons.
ai-patthana20.3:7.1_0: Defiled, Defilements for the sake of defilements and for the sake of purification of mind; for the sake of purification of mind; for the sake of worldly gain, not constricted.
ai-patthana20.3:8.1_0: That is the cause, based on the five sense fields ...
ai-patthana20.3:10.1_0: Nine what leads to the increase of nine things ...
ai-patthana20.3:11.1_0: Defilements Given Up by Defilements that give rise to defilements.
ai-patthana20.3:13.1_0: Not Defilements, hindered by defilements, and a cause of defilement arises.
ai-patthana20.3:16.1_0: for the sake of cause, based on the five reasons you’re not rid of greed, five, ten, twenty, thirty, or forty.
